title: The Lanyard
description: A father takes his son to the hills, planning to reveal the truth about a disease that has swept the world and driven survivors into a bunker-like existence that they can never share. Striking out on his own, the boy comes across a girl of his own age who leads him to a giant pyre of bodies in the middle of nowhere, unaware he is about to become the spring in a deadly trap.
author: Jake Carter-Thomas
